display_name: Overall RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation or arousal
description: RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation or arousal  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas with arousal associated with >= 2% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hremba2 + hroa2 + hnrba2 + hnroa2 + carba2 + caroa2 + canba2 + canoa2 + oarba2 + oaroa2 + oanba2 + oanoa2 ) / slpprdp

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall RDI at 2% oxygen desaturation or arousal
